content:
Snack recipe: Sweet corn stir fry | Sweet Corn Upma Servings: 4 Duration: 15-20 mins Today, I'm sharing sweet Corn snack it's easy to make and rich in taste.. It is the combination of green chillies paste, onion, tempering and salt then finally add corn, Saute and garnish with cilantro. Tada! Lovely sweet corn snack is ready to serve Nutrition facts of sweet corn: Vitamin : C Minerals : Iron & manganese Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Sweet corn - 4 fresh - ðŸŒ½ - Remove Kernels
  • Green chillies paste - 1/2 tb sp
  • Salt - 1 1/2 tsp
  • Oil - 4 tb sp
  • Onion - 2 medium - finely chopped
  • Mustard seeds - 1 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 15
Procedure:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, mustard seeds, cumin seeds & curry leaves
  • Saute 1 minute and add green chillies paste and onions
  • Mix well and saute for 3 minutes or till onion becomes soft and tender
  • Next add sweet corn kernels and saute 10-12 mins
  • Finally garnish with coriander leaves and mix well
  • Serve hot and enjoy this healthy snack
  • Happy cooking and have a good day
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices and salt according to taste
  • If you like sour and sweet taste, while serving Sprinkle 1 tsp lemon juice
